name: The Mummy's Tomb
description:
Move through 5 levels as you help return the Mummy to his Egyptian sarcophagus! By finding keys, players must match the perfect square of the key to the correct door to go deeper into the tomb. Includes 5 levels and practices numbers 1-10. A great, non-stressful and fun adventure game for kids that may not like math, but will have a great time learning with this game.

HOW TO PLAY
Move the Mummy with the arrow or WASD keys. Find Keys and click on them to collect. Once collected, click the collected key in your side inventory to hold it. Click on the door that matches the answer to your key's problem. Move through all 5 levels to complete the game and have fun!
